page.title: 03 A HOME IN CALNE
page.content: My house has got central heating and a gas fire. We have got two TV's,one is black and white but it is broken.We have got a garage and a little back garden. We have got a tree in the front. We have a little apple tree and a pear tree. We had three bedrooms but my dad knocked a wall out to make it bigger. My bedroom is going to be in the loft. I am going to have a cupboard under the stairs. We have a little passage where the dog goes and we can't get her out. My dad has put planks up and painted them. It is a semi-detached. It is the same as all the ones in the street.
